body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       BioBlitz In 2014 the Golden Gate National Recreation Area conducted a 24 hour survey of all the living things in our park! See pictures, watch the news and learn more.      In the News   Bear, Elk and Talking Ape in Post-Apocalypse Muir Woods: What are the chances?
title: Muir Woods National Monument: News
